entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Component governance failing on musl legs of servicing branches #85492
  • Analyzer: Report inefficient use of sets. #85490
  • Analyzer: Introduce an analyzer to recommend optimize dictionaries with small key types #85489
  • Analyzer: Introduce an analyzer to recommend upgrading reference tuples to the more efficient value tuples #85488
  • Analyzer: Introduce an analyzer to recommend the more efficient string splitting features in .NET 8 #85487
  • [API Proposal]: Add IHostApplicationBuilder interface #85486
  • Tracking issue for enabling the Windows thread pool #85485
  • GC Performance OS and Hardware Comparison Differences: Windows Intel vs. Ubuntu Intel and Windows Intel vs. Ubuntu ARM #85483
  • Transparently serialize collections with custom JSonConverter #85479
  • Test failure: _Avx512F_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Avx512F.Program.ConvertToVector256UInt16WithSaturationVector512UInt32() #85469
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `ISpanProvider<T>`/`IReadOnlySpanProvider<T>` interface to generalize types with `.AsSpan()` method #85468
  • Scheduled tasks stop working after 2023.04.14 1:41:36 UTC #85473
  • [Wasm.Build.Tests] Could not restore Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current.Manifest #85456
    8.0.0
  • [mono][perf] iOS disk size regression on 24 Apr 2023 #85452
    8.0.0
  • [mono][perf] iOS disk size regression on 14 Apr 2023 #85451
    8.0.0
  • [mono][perf] iOS disk size regression on 12 Apr 2023 #85450
    8.0.0
  • [mono][perf] Master issue for iOS disk size regressions #85448
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Tests.HttpWebRequestTest_Sync.GetResponseAsync_ParametersAreCachableButDifferent_CreateNewClient #85436
  • TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById is slow on Linux when input is Windows TimeZone ID #85432
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Optimize block unrolling operations using AVX-512 #83798
    8.0.0
  • Optimize field access in types not marked with beforefieldinit #1327
    8.0.0
  • Strange permissions issue when calling dylib function from C# #85428
  • [wasi] Unescaped file paths when compiling with `WasmSingleFileBundle` #84878
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8FormatterTests #76886
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in Dictionary and Hashset on 9/24/2022 1:05:07 PM #76256
    8.0.0
  • EnvironmentVariablesConfigurationProvider not loaded variable with dash ('-') symbol #85477
  • Xamarin Android C# - use of Substring() in Array.IndexOf does not work #84084
    7.0.x
  • Assertion failed 'block->lastNode()->OperGet() == GT_RETFILT' during 'Generate code' (IL size 1480; hash 0x46e9aa75; FullOpts) #85088
    8.0.0
  • [jitstress] JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_10780 fails #85449
    8.0.0
  • Store unhandled exception info on stack in Native AOT #84636
    8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Application layer protocol negotiation error was encountered #85412
  • httpclient.PostAsJsonAsync ignores jsonpropertyname attr if it starts with an @ on serialization #84612
    8.0.0
  • CLR errors #73126
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Make some System.Net.Security functions/properties public for System.Net.Quic #67552
    8.0.0
  • List.AddRange should go on interface. #85407
  • Expected to find either one or three in .../artifacts/packages/Release/Shipping/ #85394
    8.0.0
  • PNSE in System.Buffers.IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher.IndexOfAnyVectorized on iOS/tvOS arm64 #85345
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.sh #85439
  • Test failure readytorun/tests/mainv1/mainv1.sh #85442
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/SIMD/RayTracer/RayTracer/RayTracer.sh #85440
  • Update to System.Management 7.0.1 in .NET Standard 2.0 dll causes runtime binding failure in .NET Framework 4.8.1 app #85427
  • [Arm64] Peephole optimization opportunities #55365
    Future
  • ARM64: Optimize pair of "ldr reg, [fp]" to ldp #35130
    Future
  • ARM64: Optimize pair of "str reg, [reg]" to stp #35133
    Future
  • ARM64: Optimize pair of "str reg, [fp]" to stp #35134
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add better fix for UnhandledExceptionHandlerUnix #85497
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: ARR_LENGTH(new T[CNS]) --> CNS #85496
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip methods in test-merging if they use the named argument 'Skip' for the Fact attributes #85495
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move `ASG` rationalization to just after global morph #85494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix issue with hoisting and copy prop interaction #85493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Support step over and pause multiple times in same line but different columns #85484
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/8.0-preview4] [wasm] GenerateWasmBootJson - close file handles #85482
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono
  • Intrinsics analyzer and fixes #85481
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Prefer lld in NativeAot when using clang #85478
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Comment out support for mtag extension in libunwind #85474
    source-build
  • Fix volatility checks in VN and loop side effects code #85467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix cast type to conform to Roslyn API #85466
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • fix JsonNode deserialising from null #85463
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Update createdumpwindows to not appear to succeed after getting ERROR_PARTIAL_COPY 5 times #85462
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] ArmBase methods are now intrinsic. #85458
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Ignore] Testing CI #85457
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Docs on testing blazor wasm #85455
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Assert on unhandled opcodes instead of falling back to t… #85454
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add request metrics to System.Net.Http #85447
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Abstract out ParameterBuilder and implement it #85446
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Mono][RISC-V] emit mul inst instead of emulated mul #85445
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement `ExperimentalAttribute` #85444
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Ignore merged test markers for tests without execution script #85441
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Enable regex to use IndexOf(..., OrdinalIgnoreCase) for prefix searching #85438
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Improve vectorization of IndexOf(chars, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) #85437
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Allow reverse pinvoke in DoNotTriggerGc thread state regardless of coop mode. #85435
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo14::GetNonGCHeapBounds #85434
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • Enable AVX-512 for block unrollings (both copying and zeroing) #85389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Comment out support for mtag extension in libunwind #85431
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Add Android BenchmarkDotNet test #85282
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix _MergedWrapperMarker to not include markers without corresponding execution scripts #85476
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix createdump arg parsing for signal-based exceptions #85425
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.18
  • Fix createdump arg parsing for signal-based exceptions #85422
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] GenerateWasmBootJson - close file handles #85480
    area-Build-mono
  • Added the ability to specify a Spin Count Unit via a GC Configuration to release/7.0 #84495
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.7
  • [release/7.0-staging] [native-library] If a dllimport is specified with an absolute path, look for it first #85270
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-mono, 7.0.7
  • [wasi] Fix support for paths with spaces #85022
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [release/8.0-preview4] [mono] Add back OP_XOP_OVR_X_X for arm64 #85409
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Handle GT_RETFILT in fgInsertStmtNearEnd #85420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce calli address spilling #85349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Re-enable PGO for linux #85410
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Propagate some more indir flags in physical promotion #85453
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Implements the emitter::emitDispIns. #85375
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] GT_JMP implementation in codegen #85416
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V][JIT] JIT/CodeGenBringUpTest #84748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Store unhandled exception info on stack in Native AOT #84871
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview4] [browser] Fix webcil lazy loading and satellite assemblies in Wasm SDK #85400
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Use latest stable version of chrome #85114
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Delete support for IAT indirecting base type/interfaces #85376
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make some SystemNetSecurity properties public #85402
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Add back OP_XOP_OVR_X_X for arm64 #85401
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Enable other native subsets for linux-riscv64 in CI #85443
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][llvm] Enable the cold calling conv on osx/linux. #83519
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [Arm64] Replace pairs of `str` with `stp` #85032
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: prefer edge counts; keep class profiles even if tossing counts #85406
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add arm64 wasm support #83677
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution

Updated

  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - use the new sdk with templates #85498
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84806
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • Fix XUnit Log Fixer Irregularities #85183
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • Fix Diagnostic port suspension message doesn't report expected port name #85430
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    api-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Enabling RuntimeEventSource in NativeAOT #85424
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add new SafeHandleMarshaller type to provide out-of-generator marshalling support. #85419
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Stress hack for msquic dropping connections #84793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] Invoke AssemblyLoad hooks from RuntimeAssemblyBuilder:.ctor ()… #85307
    NO-MERGE, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Support encoding `TypedReference`s in signatures. #85360
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector128.Create on Arm64 for mini JIT #85404
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Use 8.1 atomics, if available, in RhpCheckedXchg/RhpCheckedLockCmpXchg #85283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] amend the crossgen2/r2rdump for LA64. #85038
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Bump package version for .net 7 to 7.0.6 #85418
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Build on mariner with llvm 16 #84676
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use the docker images with floating tags #85388
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • SHA3 #84132
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Set BuildAsStandalone for gcstress test builds #85284
    test-enhancement
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [browser] Expanding timeouts for long running test projects #85313

  • [release/6.0-staging] define UNW_AARCH64 aliases conditionally #84873
    Servicing-consider, area-PAL-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] define UNW_AARCH64 aliases conditionally #84874

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Container tests need a better way of using earlier Runtime versions #32099
  • dotnet tool install attempts to install an unlisted package on nuget.org #32092

PullRequests

Created

  • Cherry-picking the Auth changes to 8.0 branch #32108
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Try installing wasm-tool from a rollback file instead of from the feed #32107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't generate publish deps.json for excluded packages #32106
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Try out osx 13 to balance out the queue utilization #32102
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow opting-in to NativeAOT publishing using runtime packs #32100
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove msbuild properties that pointed to old versions #32089
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch format owner #32090
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Nuget vulnerabilities output #32072
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • #30336 Default Dotnet Tool to Run on Latest Runtime - Build time change #31957
    Review for breaking changes, untriaged, breaking-change, Area-Tools, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • add more knobs to control upload chunk size, and if parallel upload s… #32080
    Area-Containers
  • Follow-up to #31559 #32047
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/7.0.4xx] include container tasks and targets directly to `Microsoft.NET.Publish.Sdk` #31432
    Area-Containers
  • support correct property name and ensure compat with old name #32085
    Area-Containers
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Enable TestBaseTypeWithAmbiguousNonDefaultConstructorsRegression31655 #32091
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • Champion: "Partial Type Inference" #1349
    Any Time

PullRequests

Created

  • Add links to NRT and unconstrained type params #7147
  • Remove unimplemented struct ref features #7146

Merged

  • Incorporate notes from drafting standard text #7144

Updated

  • Lifetime annotation notation #7140

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • F1 on `global` keyword of a `global using` directive opens the wrong help page #68009
  • F1 on `using static` directive doesn't open the correct help page #68008
  • Using the VB.NET NameOf operator with an event name doesn't work unless used within the same class #68004
  • Pressing F1 on VB.NET operator NameOf goes to the wrong page #68003
  • Getting address to a managed `ref` field returns the value of the field, not the address #68000
  • Checksum's usage of a native hash algorithm resulting in thread starvation #67995

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33627.224 #68012
  • Consider avoiding irreducible loops in async codegen #67774
  • VS2022 TODO items in Task List not being updated #68001

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert bad expressions for error recovery #68011
    Area-Compilers
  • Use client languageId when file path is ambiguous #68010
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged
  • .editorconfig should only show as dirty when changed #68007
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Create file based on project path if the file path is null in LSP code action handler #68006
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Filter out EnableNullable code actions #68005
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Incremental Generators documentation fix #68002
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use optimized hash creation methods on .NET 5+ #67999
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cleanup/perf in creating member maps. #67997
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #67994
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • EnC refactoring: Align wrappers with contracts better #67967
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Include `ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler` in source build #67996
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • EnC refactoring: ProjectBaseline, ProjectDiagnostics, PendingUpdate #67941
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Add `IsExplicitExtension` #67850
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Avoid accessing DocData prior to document initialization #67978
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid retaining memory while waiting for changes #67982
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add interceptors open design questions #67970
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #67993
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Interceptors: address duplicate interceptions feedback, handle nameof, add test coverage #67971
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Improve parsing of switch expressions whith missing `}` or `]` #67943
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P3
  • Initial support for collection literal spread elements #67942
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Val/revert66430 17.6 #67849
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Always set BuildingInsideVisualStudio when loading MSBuild workspace #57219
    Area-IDE
  • Feedback on caching constructed Nullable<T> types #67807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix conditional operator nullable walker assertion #67977
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Clarify that setting to use .NET SDK preview only exists in non-preview Visual Studio #64514
    Area-Infrastructure, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MapShortCircuit causes runtime exceptions in app published as native AOT #47941
  • Add IdentityConstants.BearerAndApplicationScheme #47938
  • Replace BearerTokenOptions.ExtractBearerToken with Event #47937
  • Quarantine BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_AzureActiveDirectoryTemplate_* #47933
  • IDE0005 error when building with latest SDK #47932
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudDeleteProduct #47930
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, mvc #47929
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plainTextWithFilter #47928
  • Exception thrown during Hot Reload #47926
  • Blazor WASM using 'en' culture instead of 'en-GB' when using Accept-Language header #47924
  • Quarantine BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_IndividualAuth_NoHttps_Works_WithOutLocalDB #47919
    .NET 8 Planning
  • RDG file name mismatch between SyntaxTree.FilePath and [CallerFilePath] causes runtime KeyNotFoundException #47918

Closed

  • Update TypedResults.Stream to include optional enableRangeProcessing parameter, or change documentation. #47557
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, single_query #47700
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #47829
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, updates #47832
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes #47899
  • Add API endpoints for generating identity tokens #47227
    8.0-preview4
  • mvc F# template: conditions defined in the templates are not correct #44729
    Backlog
  • Redis as db #47773
  • Output cache middleware throws when changing AllowCacheStorage on a later stage AND when AllowLocking = true. #47253
  • dotnet application crash with segfault libcoreclr.so UBUNTU 22.04 #47636
  • Blazor: Apply Theme from Local Storage or User Storage will Meet Flicker #47746
  • Different Behavior during ASPNET Core upgrade (MSI install vs Windows Update install) #41377
    7.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Run quarantined-pr job on all release branches #47939
    area-infrastructure
  • Re-use base project for RDG tests #47936
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Remove unused variable #47931
    area-commandlinetools
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Add MapIdentityApi<TUser>() #47927
    Servicing-approved, area-identity
  • IExceptionHandler for exception handler middleware #46280 #47923
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update SDK #47540
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 8.0-preview5
  • Add MapIdentityApi<TUser>() #47414
    area-identity, 8.0-preview5
  • Add comment about SourceBuildPrebuilt versions #47935
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2168950 #47784
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • Enable prebuilt detection #47894
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • [release/8.0-preview4] [blazor] Drop explicit change of extension of assembly to lazy load #47905
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview4
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Add suppression message to JSON serialization #47910
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Fix F# starter web template. #47697
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • Quarantine BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_IndividualAuth_NoHttps_Works_With… #47920
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • Fixes CI build failures after conflicting merge affecting RDG baselines. #47917
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #47845
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Element gets duplicated after TableView is refreshed #14819

  • SwipeView does not work on Android #14805
  • Localize the warning in the implicit package references #14804
  • Add infrastructure for NuGet references to know what versions of the SDK they support #14803
  • Shell ToolbarItems not shown in iOS App #14802
  • NullReferenceException in UpdateLeftBarButtonItem #14801
    Backlog
  • Padding not applied to AbsoluteLayout within ScrollView when navigating through app shell. #14797
  • MeasureFirstItem crash app on Android #14796
  • Gestures only work on the part where the map control is displayed on the screen when it is first displayed. [iOS] #14795
  • The Map Control Lags During Scrolling When Android BottomSheet is Opened #14794
  • Android: toolbar's text style for default theme has too low contrast (very unreadable) #14793
  • Multi Columns Grid Height wrong on iOS / Android #14792

Closed

  • Visual State for button background not working #14385
  • Unable to build for Windows on Windows #14810
  • Label control with TextType set to Html not able to change FontSize #11817
    Backlog
  • Label control with TextType set to Html not able to change FontFamily #12230
    Backlog
  • [iOS, Mac] Pan gesture not working while using clip #3800
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException when Resources/Images contains non-image #6166
    Backlog
  • AVCaptureSession.isMultitaskingCameraAccessEnabled Not exposed/accessible #14789
  • iOS Binding library crash DYLD 4 Symbol missing #13464
    Backlog
  • exception upon use of OnPlatform WinUI #9390
    .NET 8 Planning
  • iOS app is crashing while tap any key on keyboard #14621
  • PointerGestureRecognizer CommandParameter using ICommand as declaring Type instead of object #14629

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the Platform* APIs for Graphics #14816

    t/housekeeping ♻︎

    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/lifecycle 🔁
  • [Housekeeping] Added sample to the Gallery to validate shape invalidations clipping #14798
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Transition away from implicit package references #14770
    area/setup 🪄
  • Use new methods for checking colors #14809
  • Correctly re-apply font formatting to HTML text #14701
    area/controls 🎮, backport/suggested

Updated

  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410

  • Fix Layout issues with the details page on Flyout #12909
    area/layout 🔲, partner/cat 😻

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • query is slow on server, but normal on windows. #30775

Closed

  • Query: missing parens for complex query with Not and Negate #30277
    8.0.0
  • Include should be able to filter on the JOIN clause with an expression on not enumerables #30781
  • Query: enable synthesizing rows from list/array of constant values to allow more queries to be server-evaluated #6660
  • Migrations: Don't generate HasConversion() in snapshot #11615
    3.0.0
  • Table with same name as a materialized view gives error #30733
  • EF Core - Example of intercepting generate sql to support old SQL Server Versions #30778
  • Avoiding duplicate code in Linq Select method and only project the properties I need #30726
  • [Column(Order = -1)]'Order' property specified was not found. #30779
  • Query: Null semantics doesn't convert LIKE to 2-value logic when optimized expansion is not allowed #30262
  • Union/Concat throwing exception when using includes/joins #30771

PullRequests

Created

  • Work on collection indexer/length normalization #30780
  • Fix navigation in UserDefinedFunction #30776

Merged

  • Use JsonScalarExpression for primitive collection indexing #30769
    auto-merge
  • Support primitive collections (port to 8.0-preview4) #30777

Updated

  • Translate x.parse #28337
    waiting-for-response
